candidate Profile Description.summary: A highly skilled Computer Science Graduate specializing in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Data Mining with excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Experienced in handling large datasets, developing data warehouses, and creating business intelligence dashboards. Adept at developing, deploying, and optimizing machine learning models. Possesses good expertise in multiple languages and frameworks.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
responsibilities: Cleaned and analyzed large datasets to identify trends and patterns.
Developed a data warehouse improving data access and analysis for the marketing team.
Created a business intelligence dashboard tracking key performance indicators for the sales team.
Used Tableau to create data visualizations communicating complex findings to non-technical audiences.

experience.title: Machine Learning Researcher, Software Engineer
responsibilities: Built and maintained data pipelines to collect, clean, and prepare data for machine learning models.
Developed, deployed, and optimized machine learning models to improve accuracy, scalability and reliability.
Showcased expertise in data mining techniques, statistical analysis, and machine learning algorithms.
Developed web-based application using java and sql.
Compiled and accessed user feedback to improve software development.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Performed quality assurance and reported bug issues.
Developed and automated test cases for software validation.
Determined scalability and performance of the test software.
Prepared project requirement documents through interview and meetings.

languages: Python (pytorch, keras, numpy, pandas, scikit-learn, seaborn, matplotlib, LSTM)

projects.name: Automated Image Caption Generator with LSTM and CNN
projects.description: The project creates a model to automatically generate a description of the provided image. The model is based on concepts of CNN, RNN, LSTM along with attention mechanism.

projects.name: Restaurant Data Analysis
projects.description: The project uses advanced data mining techniques to study various factors responsible for the success of a newly start-up restaurant.

projects.name: Bank Data Analysis
projects.description: The project aims to find the attributes in the dataset that can categorize clients based on whether they accept or reject the term deposit using ML models.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis on IMDB Reviews
projects.description: The main goal of this project is to estimate the sentiment of movie reviews from the Internet Movie Database (IMDb) by combining ML and NLP.
